article_title: Can Drugs for Malaria, HIV, and Ebola Treat Covid-19? New WHO Trial Aims to Find Out
article_description: The World Health Organization is launching a multinational clinical trial in which four existing drugs will be used to treat patients with covid 19  The project currently includes 10 countries and will potentially involve thousands of patients currently battl
